name: Phosphor Icons w/in Component Sets
description:
I made a simple tweak to Phosphor icon family, by combining the icons (variants) into a component set, now it's easier to change the weight of any icon, which makes it easier to prototype and extends its potential.

also you can copy an Icon with it 6 weights easily, select an Icon and go the main component set in "Master" page and copy the component set itself, paste it in your file.

-

The Description below is copied from the Phosphor's Figma community file

-

Phosphor is a flexible icon family for interfaces, diagrams, presentations â€” whatever, really.


  • 894 icons and counting
  • 6 weights: Thin, Light, Regular, Bold, Fill, and Duotone
  • 5,364 total icons
  • Designed at 16 x 16px to read well small and scale up big
  • Raw stroke information retained to fine-tune the style
  • Icon grid included to create your own additions


More ways to use at phosphoricons.com.


Contact us at hello@phosphoricons.com.
